data.text:
Published 1:45 am Friday, August 2, 2024

At +5000, the Hawaii Rainbow Warriors sport the ninth-ranked odds in the conference to win the MWC in 2024. Dig into the odds and other data below prior to making a futures bet.

Sign up for BetMGM to bet on Hawaii Rainbow Warriors’ odds to win their conference or the national championship.

Hawaii Mountain West Conference and National Championship Odds

National Championship Odds: Currently Unavailable

Mountain West Conference Championship Odds: +5000 (Bet $10 to win $500.00)

Season Win Total Over/Under: 5.5 (Bet $12.00 to win $10 on the over with -120 odds)

Bet on Hawaii Rainbow Warriors futures odds & games on BetMGM.

Hawaii 2024 Schedule

According to its opponents’ combined win total last season (55), Hawaii has the good fortune of facing the least challenging schedule in college football. The Rainbow Warriors will play five games this season against teams that went over .500 in 2023. That schedule includes one team that had nine or more victories and two squads with three or fewer wins last season.

Watch Hawaii Rainbow Warriors games all season long on Fubo!
